title: Fixing 3 Common Problems with Drip Irrigation

tasks.task: Install and Troubleshoot Drip Irrigation System
subtasks: Check daily for clogged drip irrigation
Identify and isolate problematic pot (clogged emitter)
Cut out and replace clogged emitters with new tubing
Drill drainage holes in overwatered pot
Extend drip irrigation system using additional tubing
Connect new tubing to existing drip system splice point
Cover exposed tubing to maintain system integrity
